definition: sounding as if the nose were pinched, an elongated rectangular bone that forms the bridge of the nose
details:
adjective
- sounding as if the nose were pinched
= example: sounding as if the nose were pinched
= synonyms: pinched
- of or in or relating to the nose
= example: of or in or relating to the nose
= synonyms: rhinal
noun
- an elongated rectangular bone that forms the bridge of the nose
= synonyms: nasal bone, os nasale
- a consonant produced through the nose with the mouth closed
= synonyms: nasal consonant
